name: Needa Kame
content: Needa Kame was an Iktotchi male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the Republic Era. Around 900 BBY, Master Kame took a leave of absence from active duty in order to meditate and study the Force on Iktotch. There, Kame created the Herder's Gauntlets to aid the Iktotchi's species' lack of telekinesis despite their strong connection to the Force.
